resources.string: TrackCovidCluster
Yes, I want to help!
Why joining?
It’s anonymous – all the time!
Tested positive?
Not infected.
Possibly infected.
you reported a positive testing.
Status
Status shown. You will be notified, if a person reports a positive test, which was close to you within the last days.
Change status
If your test result is positive, all people will be notified anonymously which were close to you within the last 14 days.
Your status will be changed to
change
Yes, I want to save lives!
It is not necessary to change back status. After calculated time your status will be reset automatically. However, you can change if it happened by måistake.
Somebody had a positive result! Please, contact your doctor or 116117 (Germany) for any further question.
If you are positive, please, change your status that others having been in touch with you can be tested.
You might be infected
You were in touch with a recently infected person!
Get an early warning if you were in touch with an infected person. With this you will have the chance to save your beloved ones from infection. Or helping others if you get infected yourself.
Your contacts within the last 14 days will be notified ANONYMOUSLY.
Tracking works with low energy bluetooth. So that it works on your mobile phone, access to your location is required. However, it will NOT be prompted or recorded.
Why does the app require the location although it won’t be recorded?
Yes, I got a positive result on a COVID-19 testing!
Do not mark yourself as infected without a positive test
"TrackCovidCluster - Notify me if I am at risk"
"Infection risk"
